memberdef.name: LazyOperationCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.OperationCount, unit: "{operations}", description: "Number of operations performed by Toolbox services"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyOperationDuration
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateHistogram<double>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.OperationDuration, unit: "ms", description: "Duration of operations performed by Toolbox services"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyDisposalCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.DisposalCount, unit: "{disposals}", description: "Number of service disposal events"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyActiveInstances
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateUpDownCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.ActiveInstances, unit: "{instances}", description: "Number of active Toolbox service instances"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyCryptoEncryptCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.CryptoEncryptCount, unit: "{operations}", description: "Number of encryption operations"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyCryptoDecryptCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.CryptoDecryptCount, unit: "{operations}", description: "Number of decryption operations"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyCryptoDataSize
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateHistogram<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.CryptoDataSize, unit: "By", description: "Size of encrypted/decrypted data in bytes"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyFileTransferUploadCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.FileTransferUploadCount, unit: "{files}", description: "Number of file upload operations"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyFileTransferDownloadCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.FileTransferDownloadCount, unit: "{files}", description: "Number of file download operations"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyFileTransferSize
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateHistogram<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.FileTransferSize, unit: "By", description: "Size of transferred files in bytes"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyFileTransferErrorCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.FileTransferErrorCount, unit: "{errors}", description: "Number of file transfer errors"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyEmailSentCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.EmailSentCount, unit: "{emails}", description: "Number of emails sent"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

memberdef.name: LazyApiRequestCounter
memberdef.initializer: = new( () => Instance.CreateCounter<long>( TelemetryConstants.Metrics.ApiRequestCount, unit: "{requests}", description: "Number of API requests"), LazyThreadSafetyMode.ExecutionAndPublication)

briefdescription.para: Gets the shared Meter instance for Toolbox services.
Gets the name of the meter.

detaileddescription.para: The meter name as defined in TelemetryConstants.

briefdescription.para: Gets the version of the meter.
Gets the counter for tracking operation counts.

detaileddescription.para: A counter instrument for operation events.

briefdescription.para: Gets the histogram for tracking operation durations.

detaileddescription.para: A histogram instrument for operation timing.

briefdescription.para: Gets the counter for tracking disposal events.

detaileddescription.para: A counter instrument for disposal events.

briefdescription.para: Gets the up/down counter for tracking active service instances.

detaileddescription.para: An up/down counter instrument for active instances.

briefdescription.para: Records an operation with the specified service name.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the service performing the operation.
The duration of the operation in milliseconds.

briefdescription.para: Records a disposal event for the specified service.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the disposed service.

briefdescription.para: Increments the active instance count for the specified service.

memberdef.argsstring: (string serviceName, string algorithm, long dataSize, int? keySize=null)
memberdef.name: RecordEncryption

parameterdescription.para: The name of the cryptography service.
The size of encrypted data in bytes.

memberdef.argsstring: (string serviceName, string algorithm, long dataSize, int? keySize=null)
memberdef.name: RecordDecryption

parameterdescription.para: The name of the cryptography service.
The size of decrypted data in bytes.

memberdef.argsstring: (string serviceName, string protocol, string host, long fileSize)
memberdef.name: RecordFileUpload

parameterdescription.para: The name of the file transfer service.
The size of the uploaded file in bytes.

memberdef.argsstring: (string serviceName, string protocol, string host, long fileSize)
memberdef.name: RecordFileDownload

parameterdescription.para: The name of the file transfer service.
The size of the downloaded file in bytes.

memberdef.argsstring: (string serviceName, string protocol, string host, string direction, string errorType)
memberdef.name: RecordFileTransferError

parameterdescription.para: The name of the file transfer service.

memberdef.argsstring: (string serviceName, string host, int recipientCount, bool hasAttachments, bool isHtml)
memberdef.name: RecordEmailSent

parameterdescription.para: The name of the mailing service.
Whether the email body is HTML.

memberdef.argsstring: (string serviceName, string httpMethod, int statusCode, bool isSuccess)
memberdef.name: RecordApiRequest

parameterdescription.para: The name of the API service.

briefdescription.para: Provides a shared Meter and pre-defined instruments for metrics collection.

detaileddescription.para: This class exposes a singleton Meter along with commonly used instruments for tracking service operations, durations, and lifecycle events.
The meter and instruments are lazily initialized and thread-safe.
